data_maturity_score.evidence: Azure-based data platform with ADLS, Databricks, and SQL DW suggests defined data practices, but no explicit mention of governance, testing, or monitoring tools

data_maturity_level.evidence: Matches score of 3 - documented Azure stack with lakehouse architecture but no advanced governance or quality monitoring mentioned

maturity_signals.evidence: Azure Data Factory, ADLS, Databricks, and serverless architecture indicate modern cloud-native stack adoption

scope_creep_score.evidence: Focused Azure data engineering role with specific tools (ADF, Databricks, SQL DW) and no conflation with ML, analytics, or DevOps responsibilities

overtime_risk_score.evidence: Onsite role in delivery center with 7+ years experience requirement suggests structured environment, but no explicit work-life balance signals

role_clarity.evidence: Well-defined Azure data engineering role with specific technology requirements and no ambiguous responsibilities

overall_red_flag_score.evidence: Low risk - well-defined senior DE role at established company with clear technology focus, though limited benefits information

reporting_structure.evidence: No information about reporting lines or organizational structure

tech_culture_score.evidence: Modern Azure stack with cloud-native tools, but no mention of engineering practices like code review, CI/CD, or testing

hiring_urgency.evidence: No mention of immediate start, ASAP, or urgent hiring needs

competition_level.evidence: Bengaluru location with 7+ years experience requirement suggests moderate competition among experienced candidates

company_stage_inferred.evidence: IBM is a well-established technology company with global delivery centers

hiring_velocity.evidence: No indication of aggressive hiring or rapid expansion; likely steady hiring for delivery center

team_size_signals.evidence: No information about data/engineering team size provided

funding_stage_signals.evidence: IBM is a publicly traded company with established financials

strength_details: Strong Azure data engineering focus with modern tools (ADF, Databricks, ADLS)
Well-defined senior role requiring 7+ years experience with clear technical requirements
Established company (IBM) with global delivery center infrastructure
concern_details: Salary not disclosed - compensation package unknown
No visa sponsorship mentioned - limited to India residents only
Limited information about career growth paths or learning opportunities
best_fit_details: Senior data engineers with 7+ years experience in Azure ecosystem
Cloud specialists with expertise in Azure Data Factory, Databricks, and ADLS
Platform architects seeking to work with enterprise-scale data solutions
probe_details: Ask about compensation range and benefits package
Inquire about career progression opportunities and technical leadership paths
Understand team structure and size of data engineering group
Clarify expected work hours and any client-facing time commitments
leverage_details: 7+ years experience with Azure data services is a strong differentiator
Experience with both batch (ADF) and streaming (Stream Analytics) is valuable
Mastery of PySpark and Scala in Azure environment exceeds typical requirements
summary.overall_assessment: Solid opportunity for senior Azure data engineers seeking to work with established technology at IBM. Strong focus on modern Azure data stack with clear role definition. Main concerns are lack of salary transparency, limited growth information, and India-only location requirement. Suitable for candidates with deep Azure expertise looking for enterprise-scale projects.
